short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your phone camera to capture current tab URL through QR Code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple url capture through QR Code. There is no need for any account to transfer current URL to your phone.

Extension does not use any permissions, QR code generation happens locally. 

Made with <3 in Latvia.
